ygData.subject: Red alert in low orbit
ygData.msgSnippet: The monitors started flashing red as a display of the upper atmosphere showed Minion presence dangerously near a factory. Lord Razorwing had dreaded that

Subject: Red alert in low orbit
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=225937926; y=3Fd5uGpMuAJ32RirDQk09hc13kePKKgHA-ignjTc7mqoLplQS-TC
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

The monitors started flashing red as a display of the upper atmosphere
showed Minion presence dangerously near a factory.

Lord Razorwing had dreaded that moment. This was the first attack in a
new War, the first blow. At the same time, he feared what the
Predacons, all of them, would do. For now, though, he had no other
choice. He had to show the Minions that the Silver Wings were not
going down... or at least not alone.

RazorWing: Shieldings Battalion, prepare to board for immediate low
orbit intervention. Shieldings Battalion, prepare for immediate action.

The Shieldings battalion was not the fastest nor the strongest the
Silver Wings had mustered, but they were a vigorous and resistant
unit. Razorwing trusted their abilities to defend the station.

In a matter of minutes, the Blackfeather warship was launched. It was
going to engage the minions, then unload the troops it transported to
offer a maximum resistance.

The Silver Wings, however, had kept hidden their starship development
program. Razorwing knew he would hear it from the other Lord.

But he had other business to do, and they would have to answer too.
